# ðŸ«€ Heart Disease Prediction

A comprehensive machine learning project comparing 6 classification algorithms for predicting heart disease.

## âœ¨ Features

- 6 ML algorithms (Logistic Regression, kNN, Decision Tree, Random Forest, LightGBM, XGBoost)

## ðŸš€ Quick Start

## ðŸ“Š Best Model

**LightGBM** - 90% accuracy, 0.95 ROC-AUC
